attributes.magic: PE32 executable (GUI) Intel 80386 Mono/.Net assembly, for MS Windows

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET POLICY IP Check Domain (icanhazip. com in HTTP Host)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET POLICY IP Check Domain (icanhazip. com in HTTP Host)"; flow:established,to_server; http.host; content:"icanhazip.com"; pcre:"/^(?:\x3a\d{1,5})?$/R"; classtype:attempted-recon; sid:2017398; rev:6; metadata:created_at 2013_08_30, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2020_08_25;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_category: Device Retrieving External IP Address Detected
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain in DNS Lookup (icanhazip .com)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain in DNS Lookup (icanhazip .com)"; dns.query; bsize:13; content:"icanhazip.com"; nocase; reference:url,github.com/chubin/awesome-console-services; classtype:external-ip-check; sid:2054169; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2024_06_28, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag External_IP_Lookup, updated_at 2024_06_28, reviewed_at 2024_10_04, mitre_tactic_id TA0043, mitre_tactic_name Reconnaissance, mitre_technique_id T1590, mitre_technique_name Gather_Victim_Network_Information;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET HUNTING Telegram API Certificate Observed
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET HUNTING Telegram API Certificate Observed"; flow:established,to_client; tls.cert_subject; content:"CN=api.telegram.org"; fast_pattern; nocase; endswith; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2029322; rev:2; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2020_01_27, deployment Perimeter, confidence High, signature_severity Minor, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2020_10_27;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET HUNTING Telegram API Domain in DNS Lookup
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET HUNTING Telegram API Domain in DNS Lookup"; dns.query; content:"api.telegram.org"; nocase; bsize:16; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2033966; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2021_09_16, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Minor, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2021_09_16;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET HUNTING Observed Telegram API Domain (api .telegram .org in TLS SNI)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET HUNTING Observed Telegram API Domain (api .telegram .org in TLS SNI)"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; content:"api.telegram.org"; bsize:16; fast_pattern; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2033967; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2021_09_16, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2021_09_16;)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Scheduled temp file as task from temp location

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: New RUN Key Pointing to Suspicious Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious new RUN key element pointing to an executable in a suspicious folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Markus Neis, Sander Wiebing, Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Schedule Task Creation From Env Variable Or Potentially Suspicious Path Via Schtasks.EXE
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects Schtask creations that point to a suspicious folder or an environment variable often used by malware

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious DNS Query for IP Lookup Service APIs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects DNS queries for IP lookup services such as "api.ipify.org" originating from a non browser process.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Hidden Executable In NTFS Alternate Data Stream
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of an ADS (Alternate Data Stream) that contains an executable by looking at a non-empty Imphash
Detects requests to exclude files, folders or processes from Antivirus scanning using PowerShell cmdlets

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Scheduled Task Creation via Masqueraded XML File
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of a scheduled task using the "-XML" flag with a file without the '.xml' extension. This behavior could be indicative of potential defense evasion attempt during persistence

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects modifications to the Windows Defender configuration settings using PowerShell to add exclusions
Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.
